attributes.action: Stopping all forms of animal cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seal clubbing, STOPS NOW! Hunting, STOPS NOW! Killing animals for fur, STOPS NOW! Whaling, STOPS NOW! Bear Dancing STOPS NOW! Animal Performers STOPS NOW! All forms of animal cruelty STOPS NOW! Stronger laws to protect innocent animals and more awareness of animal welfare. Sign the petition that matters, only you can make a difference.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stopping all forms of animal cruelty."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15086.asp

Prime Minister's Office
